author: Joel B. Pollak
title: Gavin Newsom: Coronavirus Is ‘Opportunity for Reimagining a More Progressive Era’
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom told a press conference on Wednesday that the coronavirus crisis provided an opportunity to usher in "a progressive era" through policy changes that shift American society away from capitalism.
content:
California Gov. Gavin Newsom told a press conference on Wednesday that the coronavirus crisis provided an opportunity to usher in “a progressive era” through policy changes that shift American society away from capitalism.
